section3.main_title: Cerebro Nodes Elevate Our Platform’s Efficiency and Security.
section3.cta_text: Be part of the HR and recruitment revolution, get your Cerebro nodes today and become an Omega.

what_are_nodes.title: What Exactly Are Cerebro Nodes?
what_are_nodes.description: Cerebro Nodes are individual computers within the Magneto HR network. They enable some of AI features as well as secure and decentralized data storage. Click <0>here</0> to learn more.

stats.note: *Daily rewards per node vary based on the amount of nodes online.

benefits.title: Benefits for Omega Supporters

items.title: Token Incentives for Node Operators
items.description: 2 million tokens are distributed evenly every day as a reward to all node operators.

items.title: Service NFTs Airdrops
items.description: Receive exclusive Service NFTs that unlock premium features within the Magneto HR platform.

items.title: Early and Exclusive Access to Project Insights
items.description: Access insider updates and key project insights before they’re shared publicly.

benefits.footer_note: There are more benefits to being an Omega supporter and many more to come...

section5.description: With years of experience in tech innovation, our <0 />team specializes in full-stack, database,<1>AI</1>, <2 />Human Resources and blockchain development.

julio_sanchez.name: Julio Sanchez
julio_sanchez.description: An expert in engineering management with more than 15 years of experience, Julio is leading the charge in transforming recruitment through entrepreneurial innovation.

cesar_figuereo.name: Cesar Figuereo
cesar_figuereo.description: A highly experienced software developer with a Master's in Information Technology, Cesar leads technical solutions focused on efficiency and excellence.

vladimir_reynoso.name: Vladimir Reynoso
vladimir_reynoso.description: A seasoned corporate professional and passionate blockchain advocate, providing the strategic <0 />insights essential to Magneto HR's success across industries
